item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Yitong (Amanda) Zou. I am currently a Master of Financial Engineering student at Cornell University. You can find my education here. I also have several project experiences. Things I do in spare time. Thank you for taking the time to visit my website. If you have any questions or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me via email.

item.title: Education
item.description: Cornell University Master of Engineering in Financial Engineering (Expected 2023.12) Selected Courses: Intro to Machine Learning, Stochastic Calculus, Big Data Techniques, Valuation Principles, Python for Finance University of Michigan, Ann Arbor Bachelor of Science in Mathematics (2022.04) Bachelor of Science in Economics (2022.04) Selected Courses: Linear Algebra, Advanced Calculus, Probability Theory, Mathematical Statistics, Abstract Algebra, Intermediate Econometrics Back to About Me

item.title: Projects
item.description: Spring 2023: ORIE 5370 Optimization Modeling in Finance Project Name: Long-Short trading strategy in Machine Learning The objective of our project is to develop and implement a Long-Short trading strategy based on machine learning techniques and optimization methods. We will construct our portfolio based on ML selected ranking factors which have strong correlation with well-performed/bad-performed stocks to maximize expected returns and minimize risk. Our focus is on all the stocks in the Russell 3000 index, and we will consider a range of macro, fundamental, and risk factors as potential predictors of stock performance.
